comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Patsy Ruth Miller (1904-1995), American actress known as "the most engaged girl in Hollywood" for her busy social life; later in life she was also a writer, and won three O. Henry Awards for her short stories. Her wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patsy_Ruth_Miller Considering her birthdate and the fashions she's wearing, I'm going to assume this is a 1920s photo.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: Thanks for identifying Patsy Ruth Miller and for the additional details. It does look like a photo from the 1920's. We will add more information when we update the description.
